articles.title: Fauci, face of U.S. COVID response, to step down from government posts - Reuters
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the top U.S. infectious disease official who became the face of America's COVID-19 pandemic response under Presidents Donald Trump and Joe Biden, announced on Monday he is stepping down in December after 54 years of public service.
articles.content: Aug 22 (Reuters) - Dr. Anthony Fauci, the top U.S. infectious disease official who became the face of America's COVID-19 pandemic response under Presidents Donald Trump and Joe Biden, announced on Mo… [+5159 chars]

articles.title: Adult vaccines, routine immunizations & more with L.J Tan, PhD, MS - American Medical Association
articles.description: The AMA is leading the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. See video updates on how the AMA is fighting COVID-19 by discussing adult immunizations.
articles.content:
